sourcesContent: import{jsx as r}from"react/jsx-runtime";import*as e from"react";import{useAuthenticator as s}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{ConfirmSignUp as t}from"../ConfirmSignUp/ConfirmSignUp.js";import{ForceNewPassword as i}from"../ForceNewPassword/ForceNewPassword.js";import{SetupTOTP as o}from"../SetupTOTP/SetupTOTP.js";import"@aws-amplify/ui";import"../../../primitives/TextField/TextField.js";import"../../../primitives/Button/Button.js";import"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";import"../../../primitives/Alert/Alert.js";import{SignInSignUpTabs as n}from"../shared/SignInSignUpTabs.js";import{ConfirmVerifyUser as m}from"../VerifyUser/ConfirmVerifyUser.js";import{VerifyUser as a}from"../VerifyUser/VerifyUser.js";import{ConfirmSignIn as u}from"../ConfirmSignIn/ConfirmSignIn.js";import{ConfirmResetPassword as p}from"../ResetPassword/ConfirmResetPassword.js";import{ResetPassword as c}from"../ResetPassword/ResetPassword.js";import{isSignInOrSignUpRoute as f}from"../utils.js";function d(r){const{route:f,signOut:d,user:l}=s((({route:r,signOut:e,user:s})=>[r,e,s]));return e.useMemo((()=>!("authenticated"===f||"signOut"===f)?(r=>{switch(r){case"authenticated":case"idle":case"setup":return()=>null;case"confirmSignUp":return t;case"confirmSignIn":return u;case"setupTOTP":return o;case"signIn":case"signUp":return n;case"forceNewPassword":return i;case"resetPassword":return c;case"confirmResetPassword":return p;case"verifyUser":return a;case"confirmVerifyUser":return m;default:return console.warn(`Unhandled Authenticator route - please open an issue: ${r}`),()=>null}})(f):r?()=>"function"==typeof r?r({signOut:d,user:l}):r:()=>null),[r,f,d,l])}function l({children:e,className:t,hideSignUp:i,variation:o}){const{route:n}=s((({route:r})=>[r])),m=d(e);return r(m,{className:t,hideSignUp:f(n)?i:void 0,variation:o})}export{l as Router,d as useRouterChildren};
